title: Dormitory
description: A platform that helps students and young professionals find dormitories and apartments with features like a subscription model, chatbot support, and property listings.

title: MathWise
description: An interactive math learning platform featuring games, leaderboards, and performance analytics to make math enjoyable and engaging.

title: ParkHub
description: A smart parking management system that uses IoT to track parking space availability, providing real-time data and pre-booking options.
